description: This quick and easy mustard pork chop recipe is perfect for midweek dinner.
name: Mustard Pork Chops with Apple Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 large apples, peeled, cored and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Heat half of the oil in a large pan on medium high heat and sear the pork chops for 2 minutes on each side. Set aside on a plate.
Drizzle the rest of the oil in the pan and add the onions, apples and sage leaves and cook for 5 minutes.
Pour in the stock and apple juice and stir in the mustard. Place the pork chops back into the pan and simmer for 10 minutes, until the pork is cooked through and the sauce has reduced.
